Entries.Miku0: Now that we're engaged,you can come to my shows free!.

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Miku... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Miku... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Miku in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Miku in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.Miku: I'm so excited to tie the knot with you BooBoo-chan!
Dance? I wish I knew the dance.
Time to SPRING into action, haha.
Why are people afraid of the clown?
Pft this is scary? Me singing badly is even more scary.
Entries.Miku_spouse: I had gum in my hair before,now that's scary.

Entries.Miku: Wanna get outta here with me? *wink*
What's with the fat lady over there?

And I.."/pause 500/speak Miku "I'm just..maybe..*sigh*"/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 60/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Miku "I just never thought it'd come to this with my feelings about someone."/pause 500/speak Miku "I'll come visit you today at your place..after dark,I want to sing to you."/move Miku 20 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
